result.eng: How much is two plus three?

result.ponchtml: Cá ṁéad a dó móide a tríHow much is two plus three?

result.eng: When he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.
result.ga: Ar imeacht dó dúirt Fionn go mbeadh sé ar ais
result.orig: Ar imeacht dó dúirt Fionn go mbeadh sé ar ais
result.html: Ar imeacht dó dúirt Fionn go mbeadh sé ar aisWhen he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.
result.ponchtml: Ar imeaċt dó dúirt Fionn go mbeaḋ sé ar aisWhen he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.

result.eng: He should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.
result.ga: Ba cheart dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairne
result.orig: Ba cheart dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairne
result.html: Ba cheart dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairneHe should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart dó ḃeiṫ sa ḃaile in áit ḃeiṫ ag ól i dtiṫe táḃairneHe should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.

result.eng: He should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.
result.ga: Ba chóir dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairne
result.orig: Ba chóir dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairne
result.html: Ba chóir dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairneHe should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċóir dó ḃeiṫ sa ḃaile in áit ḃeiṫ ag ól i dtiṫe táḃairneHe should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.

result.eng: This is the person to whom the money was given.
result.ga: Seo an duine ar tugadh an t-airgead dó
result.orig: Seo an duine ar tugadh an t-airgead dó
result.html: Seo an duine ar tugadh an t-airgead dóThis is the person to whom the money was given.
result.ponchtml: Seo an duine ar tugaḋ an t-airgead dóThis is the person to whom the money was given.

result.eng: They put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ga: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.orig: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.html: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad a gcoṁairlí i dteannta a ċéile agus dúirt siad gurḃ ḟearr an duais a ṫaḃairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.

result.eng: He asked me a question but I didn't answer him.
result.ga: Chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dó
result.orig: Chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dó
result.html: Chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dóHe asked me a question but I didn't answer him.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé ceist orm aċ níor ṫug mé freagra dóHe asked me a question but I didn't answer him.

result.eng: Who are you engaged to?
result.ga: Cé dó a bhfuil tú geallta
result.orig: Cé dó a bhfuil tú geallta
result.html: Cé dó a bhfuil tú gealltaWho are you engaged to?
result.ponchtml: Cé dó a ḃfuil tú gealltaWho are you engaged to?

result.eng: The lads sold him the Mercedes.
result.ga: Dhíol na leaids an Mercedes dó
result.orig: Dhíol na leaids an Mercedes dó
result.html: Dhíol na leaids an Mercedes dóThe lads sold him the Mercedes.
result.ponchtml: Ḋíol na leaids an Mercedes dóThe lads sold him the Mercedes.

result.eng: His name is Micheál.
result.ga: Micheál is ainm dó
result.orig: Micheál is ainm dó
result.html: Micheál is ainm dóHis name is Micheál.
result.ponchtml: Miċeál is ainm dóHis name is Micheál.

result.eng: After he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ga: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.orig: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.html: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid GearmáiniseAfter he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ġearmáin ar feaḋ ḋá ḃliain ṫáinig feaḃas mór ar a ċuid GearmáiniseAfter he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.

result.eng: They offered him to pay his travel costs.
result.ga: Thairg siad dó a chostais taistil a íoc
result.orig: Thairg siad dó a chostais taistil a íoc
result.html: Thairg siad dó a chostais taistil a íocThey offered him to pay his travel costs.
result.ponchtml: Ṫairg siad dó a ċostais taistil a íocThey offered him to pay his travel costs.

result.eng: I gave him permission to sit down.
result.ga: Thug mé cead dó suí síos
result.orig: Thug mé cead dó suí síos
result.html: Thug mé cead dó suí síosI gave him permission to sit down.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé cead dó suí síosI gave him permission to sit down.

result.eng: He deserves thanks.
result.ga: Tá buíochas ag dul dó
result.orig: Tá buíochas ag dul dó
result.html: Tá buíochas ag dul dóHe deserves thanks.
result.ponchtml: Tá buíoċas ag dul dóHe deserves thanks.

result.eng: He deserves praise for how well he worked.
result.ga: Tá moladh ag dul dó as a fheabhas a d'oibrigh sé
result.orig: Tá moladh ag dul dó as a fheabhas a d'oibrigh sé
result.html: Tá moladh ag dul dó as a fheabhas a d'oibrigh séHe deserves praise for how well he worked.
result.ponchtml: Tá molaḋ ag dul dó as a ḟeaḃas a d'oibriġ séHe deserves praise for how well he worked.

result.eng: I live in number three, High Street, apartment two.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí in uimhir a trí Sráid Mhór árasán a dó
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí in uimhir a trí Sráid Mhór árasán a dó
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí in uimhir a trí Sráid Mhór árasán a dóI live in number three, High Street, apartment two.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí in uiṁir a trí Sráid Ṁór árasán a dóI live in number three, High Street, apartment two.

result.eng: That one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.
result.ga: Tá sé sin imithe cheana féin ach tá ceann eile ann ag ceathrú chun a dó dhéag
result.orig: Tá sé sin imithe cheana féin ach tá ceann eile ann ag ceathrú chun a dó dhéag
result.html: Tá sé sin imithe cheana féin ach tá ceann eile ann ag ceathrú chun a dó dhéagThat one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé sin imiṫe ċeana féin aċ tá ceann eile ann ag ceaṫrú ċun a dó ḋéagThat one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.

result.eng: I know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.
result.ga: Tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúl
result.orig: Tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúl
result.html: Tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúlI know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios agam gur ag a dó a ċlog atá m'agallaṁ ar siúlI know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.

result.eng: It leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ga: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.orig: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.html: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóighIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ponchtml: Imeoiḋ sé ag a dó a ċlog sa tráṫnóna agus beiḋ sé i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫart ar ċeaṫrú tar éis a ceaṫair am Nua-Eaḃrac ar ndóiġIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.

result.eng: Does she help him?
result.ga: An dtugann sí cabhair dó
result.orig: An dtugann sí cabhair dó
result.html: An dtugann sí cabhair dóDoes she help him?
result.ponchtml: An dtugann sí caḃair dóDoes she help him?

result.eng: I have my lunch between one and two.
result.ga: Bíonn mo lón agam idir a haon agus a dó
result.orig: Bíonn mo lón agam idir a haon agus a dó
result.html: Bíonn mo lón agam idir a haon agus a dóI have my lunch between one and two.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn mo lón agam idir a haon agus a dóI have my lunch between one and two.

result.eng: He surprised her! That was nasty of him.
result.ga: Tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi Ba ghránna an mhaise dó é
result.orig: Tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi Ba ghránna an mhaise dó é
result.html: Tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi Ba ghránna an mhaise dó éHe surprised her! That was nasty of him.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sé aniar aduaiḋ uirṫi Ba ġránna an ṁaise dó éHe surprised her! That was nasty of him.

result.eng: She had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.
result.ga: Gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anois
result.orig: Gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anois
result.html: Gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anoisShe had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.
result.ponchtml: Ġeall sí dó é – ní ḟéadfaḋ sí dul siar air sin anoisShe had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.

result.eng: His uncles were teaching mathematics to him.
result.ga: Bhí a uncailí ag teagasc matamaitice dó
result.orig: Bhí a uncailí ag teagasc matamaitice dó
result.html: Bhí a uncailí ag teagasc matamaitice dóHis uncles were teaching mathematics to him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a uncailí ag teagasc matamaitice dóHis uncles were teaching mathematics to him.

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ga: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.orig: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.html: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr na ḃforbairtí seo ḃí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránaċ a ṫug deis dó feiḋmiú mar iriseoir ar ḃonn doṁanda agus ar ḃeagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.

result.eng: Upon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.
result.ga: Ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh de
result.orig: Ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh de
result.html: Ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh deUpon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.
result.ponchtml: Ar a ḋul isteaċ go teaċ na scoile dó d'aṁarc sé go scaollṁar ar gaċ taoḃ deUpon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.

result.eng: He got close enough to him to talk.
result.ga: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.orig: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.html: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sé fá ḟad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.

result.eng: But he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
result.ga: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dó
result.orig: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dó
result.html: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dóBut he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
result.ponchtml: Aċ ní raiḃ cur suas aige dóBut he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}

result.eng: I've never heard him being accused of stealing.
result.ga: Níor chuala mé gadaíocht curtha síos dó riamh
result.orig: Níor chuala mé gadaíocht curtha síos dó riamh
result.html: Níor chuala mé gadaíocht curtha síos dó riamhI've never heard him being accused of stealing.
result.ponchtml: Níor ċuala mé gadaíoċt curṫa síos dó riaṁI've never heard him being accused of stealing.

result.eng: He thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ga: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.orig: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.html: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithneHe thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ponchtml: Dar leis gur ċeart dó glór a ċinn a aiṫneHe thought he should recognize his voice.

result.eng: He would have to go to sleep on an empty stomach.
result.ga: B'éigean dó luí ar phutóga folmha go maidin
result.orig: B'éigean dó luí ar phutóga folmha go maidin
result.html: B'éigean dó luí ar phutóga folmha go maidinHe would have to go to sleep on an empty stomach.
result.ponchtml: B'éigean dó luí ar ṗutóga folṁa go maidinHe would have to go to sleep on an empty stomach.

result.eng: A little while after it got dark...
result.ga: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dó
result.orig: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dó
result.html: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dóA little while after it got dark...
